DATA.TEXT: Oh hey, Hugo! Man, what are you doing up here?
O-Oh, hiya, Emma! I'm traveling around with the mailman, he's my friend now!
The mailman, huh…? Hahaha, you're such a strange little guy, Hugo. Have a good Pudding Day!
T-Thanks, you too! And, uh… don't tell dad, please?

DATA.LIVE_TEXT: My lips are sealed, lil' bro.?
